name: Wall Fisters
description:
In which Rami Ismail and Brandon Boyer punch opposite side of the same wall

Inspired by https://twitter.com/tha_rami/status/469160212717641728

"Take that, anti-games-as-art-critics"

I know it isn't first, but I figured I might as well release it anyway

Press R for Rami punch, press B for Brandon punch
